channel.title: Quick Start
channel.description: Shokunin Static Site Generator is a blazing fast and flexible static site generator that can be used to create professional static websites and blogs. It features built-in support for GitHub Flavored Markdown, Google Analytics, Bing Analytics, Atom and RSS feeds, minification, a built-in development server, multiple content formats, and more.

item.title: Shokunin Static Site Generator - RSS Feed
item.description: An open-source static site generators (ssg) written in Rust, designed for speed, security and reliability.
